page.title: 13Traffic on the Wickwar road.
page.content: The only industry in our square is the Quarry which lies beside the B4060 road from Wickwar to Chipping Sodbury. This is an important road which takes heavy traffic from Chipping Sodbury, towards Wotton under Edge and there is a link to the M5 motorway at Falfield. It is a busy road.In only twenty minutes 48 cars,20 heavy lorries and 5 vans passed our survey point.Many of the heavy lorries were going to and from Chipping Sodbury Quarry.The hamlet of Yate Rocks in the north-west of our square lies close to the main road but most of the traffic,by-passes the houses.This is an interesting place because of the Ford in the middle of the village.The bus route on the B4060 is the Service 321 Yate to Wotton-two buses each way per day-and the 328 Bristol to Wickwar,via Chipping Sodbury-two buses per day.
